item.title: Power Query - Switching from External to Internal Data Sources
item.description: Power Query is a very versatile way to manage data in Excel. Designing your data workflows to make the most efficient use of Power Query can be challenging though. Recently, I needed to built a very simple reporting tool for keeping track on some budget numbers. I had one excel file with raw data called “Input”, and I built a data analysis workflow on top of it via power query in another file called “output”.
